startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Direct Avvo lawyer directory URL to scrape from (e.g., https://www.avvo.com/bankruptcy-debt-lawyer/al.html). If provided, practiceArea and state parameters will be ignored.

practiceArea.title: Practice Area
practiceArea.description: Legal practice area to search for lawyers (e.g., bankruptcy-debt, family, criminal-defense, personal-injury, real-estate, business, immigration, employment, estate-planning, traffic-tickets). Required if startUrl is not provided.

state.title: State
state.description: Two-letter US state code (e.g., al, ca, ny, tx, fl). Required if startUrl is not provided.

city.title: City (Optional)
city.description: Specific city within the state to narrow down search (e.g., birmingham, montgomery, huntsville). Leave empty for entire state.

maxLawyers.title: Maximum Lawyers
maxLawyers.description: Maximum number of lawyer profiles to scrape (0 = unlimited). Default is 50 for optimal performance.

includeReviews.title: Include Reviews
includeReviews.description: Extract client reviews and ratings for each lawyer. This will increase scraping time but provides valuable insights.

includeContactInfo.title: Include Contact Information
includeContactInfo.description: Extract email addresses, phone numbers, and office addresses. Recommended for lead generation.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for bypassing anti-bot protection. Highly recommended for reliable scraping.
